nodes.text: Serving from the Bridge Pit was a short story that was published in the Heir to the Empire Sourcebook released by West End Games in 1992.

Pit Lieutenant Dezon, a conscript, serves aboard the Immobilizer 418 cruiser Constrainer. When the Stormhawk requests the ship's aid with detaining a smuggler, Dezon is required to handle the gravity well projectors.
